entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as being miserable and scared, indicating that he is the one who is experiencing difficulties with Sirius Black.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned by Hagrid as having enough to deal with already, suggesting that Dumbledore is a person of importance or authority.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is described as 'lurkin' around', indicating that he is present in the area and causing concern for Hagrid.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as looking at Harry with Hermione, expecting him to berate Hagrid for not telling the truth about Black.

relationships.description: Hagrid is concerned about Dumbledore's workload and how it might affect his ability to deal with Sirius Black.
Hagrid is afraid of Sirius Black, as indicated by his reaction when Harry mentions Dumbledore's workload.
